response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it will significantly contribute to your success and satisfaction. We are offering this remarkable opportunity at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you receive the best possible value while securing this unique item before it might be unavailable due to high demand. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 1200000}
